The second level is summary information of data gathered.Examples of summary information include total monthly
prenatal consultations, total annual fully immunized infants,leading causes of infant mortality and morbidity, and averagecost of community health promotion activities.
Summary information comes in the form of totals, averages,
percentages, counts, rates and ratios.
In monitoring, remember to gather only the data needed.  Every
